Message 552 of 4024
So I am getting alarms fired. Whatever is going on has locked me out of my Xfinity account. So you have all the power for all accounts it seems. Before
at least we shared access to our data and account. Now only you can see mine. As I’ve mentioned every day since this began, I’d love to show you how
to do this like I helped get your laptop on WiFi. But I’m locked out now and beholding to your mercy and grace to see my own account. Sheesh

live happily ever after. I really wish you would let me help,but you do you. How’s my usage data look?
